Detailed Description

template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
class gaia::testing::SingleLaunchPageTestCase< TestPage, TestFixture >

If you would like to test a single page with an gaia::testing::InstrumentationTestCase, this provides some of the boiler plate to launch and finish the page in SetUp and TearDown.

This launches the page only once for the entire class instead of doing it in every setup / teardown call. If you override TearDownTestCase(), you must call super::TearDownTestCase() as the first statement in your override.

Inherits gaia::testing::InstrumentationTestCase.

TestPage is extend from gaia::core::Page

TestFixture is extend from gtest/testing/test
